attributes.action: Stop the fencing off of Middlewick Ranges Colchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is one of the few greenbelt areas left in Colchester.  There is to be a 2.4 metre fence erected around the ranges for supposed health and safety reasons.  This is used by hundreds of people every day and if this is lost it will case more harm to the local area.  e.g dog litter, vandalism and general nuisance and more work on the already over worked police.
